title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB:
Reproduce the steps in: 1GEWMOZ: 
1. Open a new basic project
2. Create a new file named test.xml
3. By default, the scripted resource editor example opens on XML files
4. In the Navigator, select test.xml
5. Choose 'Open With...'
6. Select 'Default Text Editor'

Observed Behavior:
- Nothing happens; it does not open a new editor with the selected 'Default Text Editor'
- Instead, it reactivates the scripted resource editor example that ignores the XML file content

Searching for an existing open file should also consider editor types. When opening a file with a different editor type, a new editor should be opened on the file.

Notes:
EB: When selecting the 'Default Text Editor' option, a new editor with the appropriate editor type should be opened for the selected file.
SR:
1. Open a new basic project
2. Create a new file named test.xml
3. In the Navigator, select test.xml
4. Choose 'Open With...'
5. Select 'Default Text Editor'
6. Verify that a new editor, using the 'Default Text Editor' type, is opened on the file named test.xml
